tool_description: Ultra fast text-to-speech API for text and SSML conversion to audio files or binary data streams based on Amazon Polly.
name: Text-To-Speech
title: Text-To-Speech

api_list.name: text-to-speech
api_list.description: Post text or SSML to this endpoint and get back either an mp3 file  download link or an binary audio data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech37.p.rapidapi.com/prod/kynesys-tts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech37.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech37.p.rapidapi.com/prod/kynesys-tts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech37.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
